mapper.select: SELECT aas.video_id AS videoId, aas.youtube_video_id AS youtubeVideoId, aas.youtube_channel_id AS youtubeChannelId, aas.neutral_count AS neutralCount, aas.filtered_count AS filteredCount, aas.suggestion_count AS suggestionCount, aas.risk_summary AS riskSummary, aas.analysis_timestamp AS analysisTimestamp FROM ai_analysis_summary aas INNER JOIN youtube_videos yv ON aas.video_id = yv.id INNER JOIN youtube_channels ych ON yv.channel_id = ych.id WHERE yv.id = #{videoId} AND ych.user_id = #{userId} AND ych.deleted_at IS NULL LIMIT 1

SELECT
DATE(acar.analyzed_at) AS date
DATE_FORMAT(acar.analyzed_at, '%Y-%m') AS date
YEAR(acar.analyzed_at) AS date
DATE(acar.analyzed_at) AS date
, COUNT(*) AS totalCount, SUM(CASE WHEN acar.status = 'filtered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS filteredCount, SUM(CASE WHEN acar.status = 'content_suggestion' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS suggestionCount, SUM(CASE WHEN acar.status = 'normal' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS normalCount FROM ai_comment_analysis_result acar INNER JOIN youtube_comments yc ON acar.youtube_comment_id = yc.id INNER JOIN youtube_videos yv ON yc.video_id = yv.id INNER JOIN youtube_channels ych ON yv.channel_id = ych.id WHERE ych.user_id = #{userId} AND ych.deleted_at IS NULL AND acar.analyzed_at IS NOT NULL
AND yv.id = #{videoId}
AND ych.id = #{channelId}
AND DATE(acar.analyzed_at) >= #{startDate}
AND DATE(acar.analyzed_at) <= #{endDate}
GROUP BY
DATE(acar.analyzed_at)
DATE_FORMAT(acar.analyzed_at, '%Y-%m')
YEAR(acar.analyzed_at)
DATE(acar.analyzed_at)
ORDER BY date DESC
